articles.content: WPIL Ltd, a leading pump and pumping systems company saw its shares hit an upper circuit of 20 percent at Rs 1,683 levels and reach a new all-time high in the early hours of Friday. The shares climbe… [+2294 chars]

articles.title: M&M Q3 Results: Profit rises 14% YoY to Rs 1,528 crore; revenue jumps 41% - Economic Times
articles.description: The company's EBITDA (earnings before interest, tax, depreciation, and amortisation) surged 56% YoY to Rs 2,814 crore for the quarter under review. The same was at Rs 1,803 crore in the year-ago period.
articles.content: Auto major posted 14% growth in standalone net profit at Rs 1,528 crore for the quarter ended December 2022. The company had reported a net profit of Rs 1,335 crore in the same period last year.Reven… [+2263 chars]
